name: Progress for Clash Royale
description: Get your progress, clan activity manager, friends comparison, chest tracker, wallpapers, cards analysis and many more tools for Clash Royale all of them together in one single app.  Please Note:  This content is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or specifically approved by Supercell and Supercell is not responsible for it.
